frontmatter.title: Learn React JS in 7 minutes — Beginners Tutorial
frontmatter.description: After reading this article, you should be able to start coding React apps given that you’re comfortable with Javascript.

frontmatter.title: 7 Income Ideas For Programmers(That Actually Work)
frontmatter.description: Earning $1,000 to $100,000 per month as a programmer, but requires effort, time, and maybe money to turn active to passive income.

frontmatter.title: RabbitMQ vs Redis vs Kafka
frontmatter.description: When using asynchronous communication for Microservices, it is common to use a message broker. A broker ensures communication between different microservices is reliable and stable, that the messages are managed and monitored within the system and that messages don’t get lost.
